children.name: override
children.title: Use Per-Block Settings
children.tooltip: When checked, per-block settings will be used for these settings in place of block config values.

children.name: outputBlockID
children.title: Output Block ID
children.tooltip: The ID of the block that comes out of this block.

children.name: outputBlockSpeed
children.title: Output Block Speed
children.tooltip: How fast any blocks that come out of this block move.

children.name: outTime
children.title: Out Time
children.tooltip: How long the blocks that come out of this block last before disappearing.

children.name: blinks
children.title: Blinks
children.tooltip: How many times the blocks that come out of this block "blink" before disappearing.
